name: Changes (Mike Braverman)
description:
Your goal is to get to the magic leaf at the end of the level. Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and the three mouse buttons to change water, rocks, etc. between solid, liquid, and gas.

The first game I made when I was learning how to use Unity, made in roughly three weeks about two years ago. It's not indicative of my current abilities, but I'm uploading it here in case anyone wanted to try it.
